definition: to enter heaven/to rise to the Western Paradise
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: A decent meal and a drink afterward were not the worst way to go.
sentences.chinese: 一頓美餐然後一瓶美酒，這不算上西天的最差待遇。

sentences.english: If the bomb explodes, we shall all be sent to kingdom come.
sentences.chinese: 如果炸彈爆炸，我們都得上西天。

sentences.english: Any more words before I send you into oblivion?
sentences.chinese: 就要送你上西天了，還有什麼話說嗎？

definition: to die/euphemism, lit. to return West or to the Western Paradise
same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
lit. to ascend to heaven/to die
same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
see 將功贖罪|将功赎罪[jiang1 gong1 shu2 zui4]

Buddha (term of respect for Sakyamuni 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/His Holiness (refers to a Buddhist grandee)/Buddha/God/emperor/in late Qing court, refers exclusively to Empress Dowager Cixi 慈禧太后[Ci2 xi3 tai4 hou4]
to play tricks/to cheat/to get up to mischief/to become a ghost/to give up the ghost
